schema:creator: Family, Pagel
schema:description:
__Artist's Statement:__ We designed built and painted our new chicken coop as a family during this Covid lockdown. The door painting was inspired by nature and our love of gardening. The architectural design used passive solar ideas with the south facing window and overhang. Our flock seems to love it!  
 __Participant age:__ 12, 51, 56  
 __Category:__  Family Art (collaborative piece from members of same family)
schema:name: Chicken Coop Covid Creation
schema:publisher: UC Davis Library, Archives and Special Collections
